name: Specimen
description:
You are part of a top secret military research team, working on the next genetic enhancement for the BLUE MONARCH program. Male and female genetic materials will combine to produce new strains, but mutations will arise.

Your objective is simple: keep at least one pair of blue "Male" and pink "Female" Specimen alive while destroying any green mutations that occur. The success of your research is based on how many mutations you eliminate, and how long you keep a viable pair of pink and blue Specimen alive.

Good luck Geneticist!

Specimen is part of a large science fiction space opera. To learn more about this universe and the BLUE MONARCH program, read the book Cerulean Rising: Beginnings, now available on Amazon, or go to www.diademstudios.com
